data.answer: c'est nul cela ne fonctionne jamais on me demande de payer à nouveau alors que je viens de l'acheter et je ne peut pas m'en servir

Beware!  I tried Wondershare's MobileGo which claims to backup Android phones and Tablets to a Mac.  It never recognized a Nexus 7 2013 tablet running kitkat, which it claims to support.  

While the MobileGo app appears to do nothing, it installs and launches Wondershare Helper Compact  in the background.  This app connects to download.wondershare.com and proceeds to suck down vast amounts of data.  I use a special OS X volume to test new software, so I let it go for half an hour, and all it did was suck down data at about 2 KB/s.  The MobileGo app never did anything except ask me to register.
